creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Robert Feinberg
description: male figure in grey cloak with white square pack hanging at chest; square hat, white pants; figure carries staff between arms; deer in profile standing facing L in front of male figure
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seal

upper quadrant center L edge: [九老写 ] {Kyūrō}
title: Basho and Deer
